CreateRiskCenterScanTask.document: This example shows you how to create a risk scan task.
CreateRiskCenterScanTask.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: csip.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateRiskCenterScanTask
<Common request parameters>

{
    "TaskName": "abc",
    "Assets": [
        {
            "AssetName": "abc",
            "InstanceType": "abc",
            "AssetType": "abc",
            "Asset": "abc",
            "Region": "abc"
        }
    ],
    "ScanAssetType": 0,
    "ScanItem": [
        "abc"
    ],
    "ScanPlanType": 0,
    "ScanPlanContent": "abc",
    "SelfDefiningAssets": [
        "abc"
    ],
    "ScanFrom": "abc",
    "TaskAdvanceCFG": {},
    "TaskMode": 0
}
CreateRiskCenterScanTask.title: Creating a risk scan task

ModifyRiskCenterRiskStatus.document: This example shows you how to modify the status of a risk.
ModifyRiskCenterRiskStatus.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: csip.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyRiskCenterRiskStatus
<Common request parameters>

{
    "RiskStatusKeys": [
        {
            "Id": "abc",
            "PublicIPDomain": "abc",
            "InstanceId": "abc",
            "AppId": "abc"
        }
    ],
    "Status": 1,
    "Type": 1
}
